author: David Ng, David Ng
title: New York Post: Erroneous Facebook Fact Check Relied on Professor with Ties to Wuhan Lab
description: The New York Post's editorial board has penned a scathing article about Facebook's fact-checking operations, revealing that an erroneous fact check performed on one of the newspaper's opinion pieces about the origins of the Chinese virus relied on information…
content: The New York Post’s editorial board has penned a scathing article about Facebook’s fact-checking operations, revealing that an erroneous fact check performed on one of the newspaper’s opinion pieces about the origins of the Chinese virus relied on information… [+2874 chars]
